attributes.action: Introduce the teaching of foreign languages to children in infant school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our society does not do enough to encourage people to learn foreign languages, the rest of the world learns our language so why dont we do the  same and teach children from a young age to speak other languages. I think it is important that they learn from a young age because they will pick up the language alot easier and be fluent by the time the reach adulthood.
